title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Sit smarter, feel better. The BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work is your everyday comfort upgrade—crafted with high quality foam and a durable fabric cover to support your legs, back, and posture wherever you work or relax. Its clever two-layer design lets you choose your perfect height: use the 2.0-inch lower layer alone or add the 3.7-inch upper layer for extra lift. Adjustments are quick and secure thanks to sturdy magic tapes and a smooth zipper, so your setup stays just the way you like it.

Designed for all-day ergonomics, this footrest promotes proper sitting habits, helps relieve back, lumbar, and knee discomfort, and keeps you comfortably aligned whether you’re at the office, at home, driving, or on a long flight. Place it under your feet to reduce pressure or behind your knees for gentle support—its versatile shape fits effortlessly under most desks and in tight spaces. The non-slip bottom keeps it stable on any floor, while the removable, machine-washable cover makes cleanup a breeze.

Sleek in black and sized just right at 16.9 inches long by 11.2 inches wide, BlissTrends brings a polished, professional look to your workspace with the comfort your body craves. Enjoy instant relief, adjustable support, and easy care—all in one smart, travel-friendly footrest. Treat your feet and transform your day with BlissTrends.
